title: Finance Manager
text:
Job Ref: HQ00070530 
A fantastic new opportunity as A UK Finance Manager has arisen within a busy US law firm based in London. General responsibilities include coordination of all financial aspects of the U.K. office of a U.S. law firm including financial statement preparation, accounts payable, accounts receivable, client trust funds, VAT processing, billing, tax filings and other general accounting areas of the finance department in London. You will be instrumental in refining and enforcing accounting controls and procedures in concert with the U.S. office as well as promoting excellence in a service oriented, team environment. As the Finance Manager you will be preparing financial statements on a cash and accrual basis, coordinate accounts payable, client trust and receivable as well as maintaining General Ledger chart of accounts and vendor files within the U.S. office. You will be maintaining bank relationships and participate in month/year end balancing and report distribution whilst also managing the Treasury including daily, monthly cash flow forecast and reconciliation. Furthermore you will maintain a monthly general ledger review and monitoring the bank and ledger reconciliations, including issue resolution as well as assessing and communicating with the U.S. office with the status of all processes, task assignments and related records management. To be successful in this UK Finance Manager position you will have a good amount of experience of accounting within a law firm. You must be able to interact with and provide a client support framework in a multi-currency environment as well as having the ability to provide the U.S. office with a resource for Solicitor's Accounts Rules and good understanding of Inland Revenue requirements and reporting. You must have in depth knowledge of accounting practices and principles and having worked within a U.K. office of a U.S. law firm would be highly beneficial. You must have a degree in accounting.
